name: Free Agent
description: A self-driven wanderer who owes loyalty to no one and follows whatever opportunity brings the most benefit.

feature.name: Self-Made
feature.description: You have loose ties in many places and can call in small favors from almost any walk of life. You gain proficiency in Persuasion with a miscellaneous bonus equal to your reputation.

proficiency_choices.description: You may select any six armor, weapon, or tool proficiencies.

skill_choices.description: Choose any two skills from the full skill list.
